接口 Animatable

所有超级接口:
Drawable
所有已知实现类:
AnimatablePanel, Chart, CollectionSelection, ResultPage, Settings, SongSelection, UserSelection, WelcomePage
public interface Animatable extends Drawable
The Animatable interface extends the Drawable interface to include methods for handling appearance and disappearance animations of an object. Implementing classes define the specific behavior for these animations.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    onAppearance(Graphics2D g2d)
    Called when the object needs to handle its appearance animation.
    void
    onDisappearance(Graphics2D g2d)
    Called when the object needs to handle its disappearance animation.

    从接口继承的方法 org.kelvinizer.support.interfaces.Drawable

  • 方法详细资料

    • onAppearance

      void onAppearance(Graphics2D g2d)
      Called when the object needs to handle its appearance animation.
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D context used for drawing the appearance animation

    • onDisappearance

      void onDisappearance(Graphics2D g2d)
      Called when the object needs to handle its disappearance animation.
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D context used for drawing the disappearance animation
